And now, he is willing to sell these Eagles NFTs to the true fans of golf around the world, as well as give them a chance to win ETH.Around 2,000 of Dr. Shankâ€™s Eagles NFTs represent golf professionals playing on the PGA, LPGA, European Tour and/or Ladies European Tour, and the remaining Eagles represent other exciting things. When you purchase a Dr. Shankâ€™s Eagles NFT, you also receive all the associated rights as well as stand to receive rewards for the associated professional.âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦ How it works âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦Each season, Dr. Shank will select his favorite tournaments, and based on the results, the holder of winning Eagles (NFTs) will be rewarded with Ethereum.Rewards will be offered for the following golf tournaments:1. Top 10 Men's Tournaments by Total Purse2. Top 10 Women's Tournaments by Total Purse3. PGA LPGA European Tour And Ladies European Tourâœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦ How to participate âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦âœ¦âœ§âœ¦âœ¦In order to participate to earn ETH, all you have to do is buy Dr. Shankâ€™s Eagles NFTs and then patiently wait for the results of the selected tournaments.
